    • Method Detail

      • readItemProperties

        public static Stock readItemProperties(java.lang.String filePath)
                                throws CSVFormatException,
                                       java.io.IOException,
                                       StockException
        This method is used to read item_properties.csv and convert the contents into a stock object. This is primarily used for initialization
        Parameters:
        filePath - used to specify the file location that needs to be read from
        Returns:
        initStock - returns a stock object of alls the item properties read from the file
        Throws:
        CSVFormatException - throws an error when the csv format is different
        java.io.IOException - throws an error when there is an IO error
        StockException - throws an error when there a problem dealing with a stock object

      • writeManifest

        public static void writeManifest(Manifest manifest,
                                 java.lang.String filePath)
                          throws CSVFormatException,
                                 java.io.IOException,
                                 StockException,
                                 DeliveryException
        A Write method to generate a CSV manifest document. The method accepts manifest object and writes to the CSV document
        Parameters:
        manifest - the manifest object that needs to be written
        filePath - the file path of where the manifest csv needs to be saved
        Throws:
        CSVFormatException - throws an error when there a csv format error
        java.io.IOException - throws an error when there is an IO error
        StockException - throws an error when there a problem that occurs with the stock
        DeliveryException - throws an error when there is a problem with the delivery object

      • readManifest

        public static Manifest readManifest(java.lang.String filePath,
                                    Stock inventory)
                             throws CSVFormatException,
                                    java.io.IOException,
                                    DeliveryException,
                                    StockException
        Reads a manifest and creates a manifest object that adhears to manifest csv
        Parameters:
        filePath - the file path of the manifest csv
        inventory - the intial inventory that will be used to import stock
        Returns:
        manifest - the manifest object that is outputed from the manifest csv
        Throws:
        CSVFormatException - throws an error when there a csv format error
        java.io.IOException - throws an error when there is an IO error
        DeliveryException - throws an error when there is a delivery error
        StockException - throws an error when there is a stock error

      • readSalesLog

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> readSalesLog(java.lang.String filePath)
                                                                          throws CSVFormatException,
                                                                                 java.io.IOException
        A method which returns a hashmap of all item names and their variables which exist within the manifest.csv
        Parameters:
        filePath - the file path of the sales log csv
        Returns:
        a HashMap containing Item names and their quantities
        Throws:
        CSVFormatException - throws an error when the sales log isn't in the correct format
        java.io.IOException - throws an error when there is an IO problem
